channel.title: A few questions, pretty basic
channel.description:
1. how do i edit safe zones?
2. how do i get rid of wildy lvls? (ex- if u r lvl 70 and u attack a 72 in lvl 1 wildy, it wont work)i want to know how to delete that
3.can sum1 get me a link for that player owned clan system tut
4.my robe tops r glitched, u can see through the top part of the sleeves, how do i fix?

item.title: A few questions, pretty basic
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

make sure the ID code is in the body and platebody section of item.java regardless. One or the Other usually fixes it.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions, pretty basic
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

If you look a page or two back, you’ll see where I helped someone else fix wildly areas.

I’m not a hundred percent sure how to remove the levels theirselves.

The link is in tutorial section, most likely listed under the TuT list.

Gladly, go into item.java and place the ID codes of the glitched items in their appropriate spots.

I.e. if you have a robe top which is glitchy or going to wrong spot, and it’s ID let’s say is… 636

you’d open up Item.java

go to the part that says

public static int body[] = {5032,5028,6065,1844,5034,6788,7134,7128,7110,7122,6750,6615,6617,5575,7592,6129,6322,6139,6133,129,6916,6654,7390,7392,7362,7364,7399,7374,7376,7372,7370,1035,540,5553,4757,1833,6388,6384,2501,2499,4111,4101,4091,6186,6184,6180,3058,4509,4504,4069,4728,4736,4712,6107,2661,3140,1101,1103,1105,1107,1109,1111,1113,1115,1117,1119,1121,1123,1125,1127,1129,1131,1133,1135,2499,2501,2503,2583,2591,2599,2607,2615,2623,2653,2669,3387,3481,4712,4720,4728,4749,4892,4893,4894,4895,4916,4917,4918,4919,4964,4965,4966,4967,6107,6133,6322,426};

then add 636 in there with a comma seperating it from other numbers. Should fix if it doesn’t then put it in the platebody section also.

Read full topic
